about.label: About Us
about.paragraph1: Inhale Blue is a freediving school that operates according to the methods of Apnea Academy. Our teaching is based on the human innate connection to the underwater world. We believe that, at our core, we are all freedivers – with the right knowledge, we simply discover what has always been a part of us.
about.paragraph2: Our approach to diving is not focused on numbers, such as depth in meters or apnea times. What matters to us are the feelings – relaxation and enjoyment underwater. We believe that all depths can be reached in a safe and enjoyable way.

principles.label: Our Philosophy
principles.title: Guiding principles
principles.description1: Responsible diving means looking after ourselves and others, underwater and above.
principles.description2: Even more important than trusting others is trusting yourself, therefore we learn to listen to our body and mind.
principles.description3: We are connected by deep friendship and a strong sense of trust, belonging, and unity.
principles.description4: We teach the most modern ear equalization techniques, enabling completely relaxed and enjoyable dives.
principles.description5: A perfect dive means briefly forgetting the world above and completely surrendering to the water.
principles.description6: In depth and apnea, everyone faces their own fears, so we dedicate ourselves to each person individually.
principles.description7: Complete relaxation, a sense of safety, and team trust create an incredible connection with yourself and the sea.
principles.description8: Our courses are longer than usual, enabling faster progress and a complete immersion into yourself.

courses.label: Experiences
courses.title: Courses & Training
courses.description1: Our signature freediving course for beginners and experienced freedivers. 6 days of total immersion into the world of freediving. A life-changing experience.
courses.description2: One-day intensive training in a 40-meter deep pool. Focus on equalization techniques and relaxed depth diving with two dive series and balloon exercises.
courses.description3: Freediving courses for kids following the Apnea Academy Kids as Dolphins program. Learning through play in the crystal-clear waters of Silba island.
courses.description4: Dynamic apnea with and without fins, static apnea, breathing, relaxation, and swimming techniques. Up to 4 days per week.
courses.description5: Our Bali freediving program is designed for the ones seeking to explore breath-hold diving in a focused, safe, and inspiring environment.
